```
create table user
(
    id     bigint not null constraint user_pkey primary key,
    name   varchar(255),
    age    integer,
    locked boolean
);
```

```
create table user
(
    id     bigint not null constraint user_pkey primary key,
    name   varchar(255) default 'John Snow',
    age    integer      default 35,
    locked boolean      default false
);
```
